N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 7.1 - Issuance and classification

State Regulations
(a) The commissioner shall make regulations governing the training and
certification of all persons requiring certification employed in the public
schools of the State. The certificates issued pursuant to such regulations
shall be of the following general classifications: (1)
certificates for administrative and
supervisory and educational leadership service; (2)
certificates for classroom teaching
service; (3)
certificates for
school service; (4)
certificates of
qualification; and
(5)
professional
coaching certificates. (b) The commissioner shall issue a regional
credential pursuant to the provisions of section
80-5.8
of this Title. (c) Any school district in the State may
employ unusually qualified persons as visiting lecturers to supplement the
regular program of instruction provided that said persons are licensed in
accordance with the regulations of the Commissioner of Education. Notes
